verbs.description: romney endorses [V: thad] [ARG2: gray] for treasurer mitt romney the former republican nominee for president endorsed thad gray the gop candidate for connecticut treasurer tuesday thad gray is the most qualified candidate to be connecticut next state treasurer romney said in a statement i hope all connecticut residents see he is the man to help cure the state severe financial challenges romney governor of massachusetts from 2003 to 2007 and co - founder of bain capital is now campaigning for the utah u s senate seat of orrin hatch who is retiring after more than 40 years in the senate gray met romney during his 2012 presidential run said catherine marx spokesperson for gray campaign gray volunteered for and contributed to romney 2012 campaign mitt romney romney republican party united states treasurer thad gray gop
